::Reptilica::

Reptilica's eyes widen as he looks around at the three Vok, dropping his gun. 
"Uh.. I... Uh..." he says, knowing that they could kill him in a few seconds.

"I thought I'd come welcome you guys to the planet....." he says, looking 
nervioustly at their weapons.
